headline.seo: At the Alexander Hotel, Art Imitates Indianapolis

docs.abstract: Indianapolis Museum of Art curators have filled Alexander Hotel, scheduled to open on January 21, with contemporary art that resonates with and sometimes mocks the region.
docs.lead_paragraph: An installation throughout the new Alexander Hotel reflects the city’s history.
docs.snippet: An installation throughout the new Alexander Hotel reflects the city’s history....

headline.main: AMERICANS LOSE HOTELSITE; Mallaby-Deeley, M.P., the Purchaser of St. George's Hospital Site.

byline.original: By Marconi Transatlantic Wireless Telegraph to The New York Times

docs.abstract: Americans fail to obtain site; purchaser, price
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 11. - H. Mallaby-Deeley, M.P. for Harrow, is the purchaser of the St. George's Hospital site on which a huge hotel is to be built.
docs.snippet: LONDON, July 11. - H. Mallaby-Deeley, M.P. for Harrow, is the purchaser of the St. George's Hospital site on which a huge hotel is to be built....

headline.main: NEW $1,000,000 HOTEL FOR TIMES SQUARE; Site Near North End and Building Will Comprise Restaurant and Bachelor Quarters.

docs.abstract: J B Martin reveals plans for $1-million hotel near north end of Times Sq
docs.lead_paragraph: Jean Baptiste Martin will sail to-day for Europe on the North German Lloyd liner Kronprinzessin Cecilie, after completing plans for the building of a one-million-dollar fifteen-story restaurant, with bachelor apartments, near the north end of Times Square, which he intends to operate in addition to the Cafe Martin at Twenty-sixth Street and Broadway.

docs.abstract: Editorial notes new efforts being made to suppress Raines Law hotels
docs.lead_paragraph: The co-operation of the State Excise Board and the police for the more effectual regulation and suppression of the worst resorts, carried on either as Raines Law Hotels or simply as what are known to the police as dives, promises such excellent result that it is surprising that it has not long since been adopted.
